slide.title: Timezones Utilities
slide.subtitle: Transition Times
slide.example:
<?php
	$tz = timezone_open("Europe/Amsterdam");
	$trs = timezone_transitions_get($tz);
	$trs = $tz->getTransitions();

	echo "<pre>\n";
	foreach ($trs as $tr) {
		printf("%20s %7d %d %s\n",
			$tr['time'], $tr['offset'],
			$tr['isdst'], $tr['abbr']);
	}
?>
